code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{Link,useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import'./Login.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const API_BASE_URL='https://pm-back.onrender.com';const API_URL="".concat(API_BASE_URL,"/api/auth/register");const Signin=props=>{const{onSignin,showToast}=props;const[username,setUsername]=useState('');const[email,setEmail]=useState('');const[password,setPassword]=useState('');const[error,setError]=useState('');const navigate=useNavigate();const handleSubmit=async e=>{e.preventDefault();setError('');try{const res=await fetch(API_URL,{method:'POST',headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'},body:JSON.stringify({username,email,password})});const data=await res.json();if(!res.ok)throw new Error(data.error||'Sign up failed');localStorage.setItem('token',data.token);if(onSignin)onSignin(data.user);if(typeof showToast==='function')showToast('Successfully logged in!');navigate('/dashboard');}catch(err){setError(err.message);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"login-ui-container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{className:"login-ui-card",onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"login-ui-title",children:"Sign Up"}),error&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"login-ui-error",children:error}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{className:"login-ui-input",type:"text",placeholder:"Username",value:username,onChange:e=>setUsername(e.target.value),required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{className:"login-ui-input",type:"email",placeholder:"Email",value:email,onChange:e=>setEmail(e.target.value),required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{className:"login-ui-input",type:"password",placeholder:"Password",value:password,onChange:e=>setPassword(e.target.value),required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"login-ui-button",type:"submit",children:"Sign Up"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"login-ui-switch",children:["Already have an account? ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/login",children:"Login"})]})]})});};export default Signin;
